introduction.para:
The Plugin Command Stub is a managed class that implements the T:Jacobi.Vst.Core.Plugin.IVstPluginCommandStub interface. This interface is called by the
from the interop assembly. The managed plugin must implement this class as a public type in order for the
to create an instance of it that is used by the interop assembly.
The framework assembly contains a default implementation that dispatches these method calls to the appropriate framework interface method.

content.para:
Because the framework contians a base class that implements the T:Jacobi.Vst.Core.Plugin.IVstPluginCommandStub interface, you simply derive your public class and override the M:Jacobi.Vst.Core.Plugin.StdPluginCommandStub.CreatePluginInstance method and return a new instance of the
.

alert.para:
Note that the public class explicitly derives from T:Jacobi.Vst.Core.Plugin.IVstPluginCommandStub . When the
loads the managed Plugin assembly it will search for a public type that implements that interface, but it does not search for it on base classes. By explicitly implementing the interface on your
you signal that this public class is the Command Stub to use.

content.para: When interfacing at the core level with vstnet you have to imlement all the methods of the T:Jacobi.Vst.Core.Plugin.IVstPluginCommandStub interface yourself.
